altername_name: Naruto Shippūden: Gekitou Ninja Taisen! Special
name: Naruto Shippuden: Gekitou Ninja Taisen! Special
overview: Naruto Shippūden: Gekitō Ninja Taisen! Special (NARUTOナルト 疾風伝 激闘忍者大戦! Special, lit. Naruto Shippūden: Great Ninja Battle! Special) is the eighth installment of the Clash of Ninja series only for Japan that features an updated character roster, a substitution bar, and online play. It was released on December 2, 2010 in Japan, and is thus the final game of the series.
